media.headline: Arenado ignites a double play
media.blurb: SEA@COL: Arenado teams with LeMahieu for double play
media.bigblurb: Nolan Arenado gathers the grounder and teams up with DJ LeMahieu for a double play to end the top of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Gallardo starts the double play
media.blurb: SEA@COL: Gallardo works with Cano for a double play
media.bigblurb: Yovani Gallardo snags a grounder and teams up with Robinson Cano for a double play to close out the 2nd inning

media.headline: Wolters cuts down Martin
media.blurb: SEA@COL: Wolters nabs Martin attempting to steal
media.bigblurb: Tony Wolters springs up from behind the plate and fires down to second, catching Leonys Martin attempting to steal second base

media.headline: Arenado's solo home run
media.blurb: SEA@COL: Arenado's solo homer opens the scoring
media.bigblurb: Nolan Arenado opens the scoring with a solo home run to left field as the Rockies take a 1-0 lead in the bottom of the 4th inning

media.headline: Parra sends a single to center
media.blurb: SEA@COL: Parra singles a ground ball to center field
media.bigblurb: Gerardo Parra sends a ground ball to center field for a single in the bottom of the 2nd

media.headline: Ruiz nabs Piron stealing second
media.blurb: SEA@COL: Ruiz catches Piron stealing second base
media.bigblurb: Carlos Ruiz springs up behind the plate and makes a great throw to Brock Hebert to prevent Jonathan Piron from stealing second base

media.headline: Gonzalez previews Opening Day
media.blurb: SEA@COL: Gonzalez looks ahead to Opening Day
media.bigblurb: Carlos Gonzalez takes some time to discuss the upcoming season, Gerardo Parra's return and Bud Black

media.headline: Petty's single drives Hebert in
media.blurb: SEA@COL: Petty scores Hebert on single
media.bigblurb: Kyle Petty sends a line drive to center field and plates Brock Hebert, tying the game at 1 in the top of the 7th

media.headline: Black on Senzatela's outing
media.bigblurb: Rockies manager Bud Black talks about Antonio Senzatela's pitching performance in the team's game against the Mariners

media.headline: Senzatela on his outing
media.blurb: SEA@COL: Senzatela discusses his two-inning outing
media.bigblurb: Rockies pitcher Antonio Senzatela talks about his excitement on the mound in his two-inning outing against the Mariners
